plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is coming-of-age, their favourite plot is character-driven, their favourite setting is a fictionalized version of their own life, their favourite writing style is stream-of-consciousness, their favourite length is novella, their favourite topic is the human condition, their favourite pacing is slow and methodical, their favourite narrative structure is nonlinear, and their favourite themes are identity, mental health, and the nature of growing up.
